img.alt: Horizontal pivoted rod with vertica endl spring attached to one end and a mass to suspended at the other

problem.p: A block of mass \(m\) is suspended on a light string attached to the end of a light bar pivoted as shown. The other end of the bar is connected to a spring with a force constant \(k\). Initially, the system is in equilibrium and the bar is horizontal. The pivot point divides the bar in 2:1 ratio as shown. Find the period \(T\) of vertical small-amplitude oscillations of the block.
